Enumeration Type Documentation

enum TetrisPieceId

Enumerates all tetris piece types.

Enumerator:
TETRISPIECE_ID_O 

square piece

TETRISPIECE_ID_I 

line piece

TETRISPIECE_ID_S 

reverse-squiggly piece

TETRISPIECE_ID_Z 

squiggly piece

TETRISPIECE_ID_L 

L piece.

TETRISPIECE_ID_J 

reverse-L piece

TETRISPIECE_ID_T 

T piece.
